TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 向 XAML 处理器指示在序列化时应修剪标记中该类型元素四周的空白。

span.span: Indicates to XAML processors that the whitespace surrounding elements of the type in markup should be trimmed when serializing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将应用于可能显示为在空格重要内容中的子元素的特定类型。This attribute is applied to specific types that might appear as child elements within whitespace significant content. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 XAML 中的空白处理](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md). 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
